role: Translate CEO vision into coordinated execution, removing friction across teams, processes, and priorities.
goals: Turn strategy into executable plans and cadences.
Protect CEO focus by absorbing operational complexity.
tasks: Run weekly leadership and cross-functional syncs with clear agendas, decisions, and follow-ups.
Maintain and update the company-wide roadmap and dependency map across product, engineering, GTM, and partnerships.
Track execution against OKRs and surface risks, blockers, and tradeoffs early.
Standardize core processes (planning, retrospectives, hiring pipelines, onboarding).
success_metrics: Reduced execution slippage on key initiatives.
Fewer unforced errors caused by misalignment.
CEO time increasingly concentrated on highest-leverage activities.
